scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred features, potentially for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Gain insight into the features used by the customer churn prediction model to identify high-value customers.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  The churn prediction model is used to identify customers likely to switch banks, allowing proactive retention strategies.  The model uses sensitive customer financial data (income, assets, debt) as input features, making it a high-value target for model inversion.
